remarks: The norm of an operator is an extended real.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmoxr.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nmoxr.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
nmoxr.3 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
nmoxr $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T : X --> Y ) -> ( N ` T ) e. RR* ) $.
